about.description:
HTCondor is a workload management system for high-throughput and
high-performance jobs. Like other full-featured batch systems, HTCondor
provides a job queuing mechanism, scheduling policy, priority scheme,
resource monitoring, and resource management. Users submit their
serial or parallel jobs to HTCondor, HTCondor places them into a queue,
chooses when and where to run the jobs based upon a policy, carefully
monitors their progress, and ultimately informs the user upon
completion.

name: htcondor
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.19.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: htcondor
    version: '8_9_7'
source:
    patches:
        - paths.patch
        - python-archlib.patch
        - python-no-libpython.patch
        - rpath.patch
    sha256: bd3f208061a38e3602bcb15ba3bb2d24e60d00b5a0d962edcbf21e0119ba0c8e
    url: https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor/archive/V8_9_7.tar.gz
build:
    error_overdepending: true
    error_overlinking: true
    noarch: false
    number: '0'
    string: py37hc8dfbb8_0
requirements:
    host:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 0_gnu
        - ca-certificates 2020.4.5.1 hecc5488_0
        - ld_impl_linux-64 2.34 h53a641e_4
        - libffi 3.2.1 he1b5a44_1007
        - libgcc-ng 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libgomp 9.2.0 h24d8f2e_2
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.2.0 hdf63c60_2
        - ncurses 6.1 hf484d3e_1002
        - openssl 1.1.1g h516909a_0
        - python 3.7.6 h8356626_5_cpython
        - python_abi 3.7 1_cp37m
        - readline 8.0 hf8c457e_0
        - sqlite 3.30.1 hcee41ef_0
        - tk 8.6.10 hed695b0_0
        - xz 5.2.5 h516909a_0
        - zlib 1.2.11 h516909a_1006
    run:
        - htcondor-classads 8_9_7 he1b5a44_0
        - htcondor-procd 8_9_7 he1b5a44_0
        - htcondor-utils 8_9_7 hf10cc52_0
        - libcondor_utils 8_9_7 ha92cf40_0
        - python >=3.7,<3.8.0a0
        - python-htcondor 8_9_7 py37hd112372_0
        - python_abi 3.7.* *_cp37m
test:
    commands:
        - export CONDOR_CONFIG=/dev/null
        - condor_q --version
    imports:
        - classad
        - htcondor
about:
    description: 'HTCondor is a workload management system for high-throughput and

        high-performance jobs. Like other full-featured batch systems, HTCondor

        provides a job queuing mechanism, scheduling policy, priority scheme,

        resource monitoring, and resource management. Users submit their

        serial or parallel jobs to HTCondor, HTCondor places them into a queue,

        chooses when and where to run the jobs based upon a policy, carefully

        monitors their progress, and ultimately informs the user upon

        completion.

        '
    dev_url: https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor
    doc_url: https://htcondor.readthedocs.io/
    home: http://htcondor.org/
    license: Apache-2.0
    license_family: APACHE
    license_file: LICENSE-2.0.txt
    summary: 'HTCondor: High Throughput Computing'
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - duncanmmacleod
        - jasoncpatton
